Cell.Data: The DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES column contains info on what text between { } signs means (if applicable). It usually stands for either a numeric value, or a numeric value with an icon. Text between [ ] signs stands for a certain type of icon.
This is an energy exploitation. It provides various economic bonuses based on its level. Levels can be increased via economic research.
能源开发建筑，不同等级可提供不同经济加成。可通过经济研究进行升级。

An exploitation is a structure built in a sector attached to your colony, that allows you to exploit the land for resources. The 'Energy Exploitation' part can be treated as a structure.
Sector Exploitations have a Level, which is their upgrade level, so a level 1 sector is weak, level 2 is stronger etc. This has to do with how much income the sector exploitation generates.
A slot refers to a place a colonist can be assigned to. Slots are spaces for colonists to occupy.
{EnergySlots}[energySlot/] slot[br/]{EnergyFlat}[energy/] income[br/]{EnergySlotIncome}[energy/] per [population/] in [energySlot/][br/]{EnergyMultiplier}[energy/] income in the colony
{EnergySlots}[energySlot/]槽位[br/]{EnergyFlat}[energy/]收益[br/][energySlot/]中每名[population/]产出 {EnergySlotIncome}[energy/][br/]{EnergyMultiplier} 殖民地[energy/]收益
This is a production exploitation. It provides various economic bonuses based on its level. Levels can be increased via economic research.
工业开发建筑，不同等级可提供不同经济加成。可通过经济研究进行升级。

{ProductionSlots}[productionSlot/] slot[br/]{ProductionFlat}[production/] income[br/]{ProductionSlotIncome}[production/] per [population/] in [productionSlot/][br/]{ProductionMultiplier}[production/] income in the colony
{ProductionSlots}[productionSlot/]槽位[br/]{ProductionFlat}[production/]收益[br/][productionSlot/]中每名[population/]产出 {ProductionSlotIncome}[production/][br/]{ProductionMultiplier} 殖民地[production/]收益
This is a food exploitation. It provides various economic bonuses based on its level. Levels can be increased via economic research.
农业开发建筑，不同等级可提供不同经济加成。可通过经济研究进行升级。
{SupplySlots}[foodSlot/] slot[br/]{SupplyFlat}[supply/] income[br/]{SupplySlotIncome}[supply/] per [population/] in [foodSlot/][br/]{SupplyMultiplier}[supply/] income in the colony
{SupplySlots}[foodSlot/]槽位[br/]{SupplyFlat}[supply/]收益[br/][foodSlot/]中每名[population/]产出 {SupplySlotIncome}[supply/][br/]{SupplyMultiplier} 殖民地[supply/]收益
This is a research exploitation. It provides various economic bonuses based on its level. Levels can be increased via economic research.
研究开发建筑，不同等级可提供不同经济加成。可通过经济研究进行升级。

{ResearchSlots}[researchSlot/] slot[br/]{ResearchFlat}[research/] income[br/]{ResearchSlotIncome}[research/] per [population/] in [researchSlot/][br/]{ResearchMultiplier}[research/] income in the colony
{ResearchSlots}[researchSlot/]槽位[br/]{ResearchFlat}[research/]收益[br/][researchSlot/]中每名[population/]产出 {ResearchSlotIncome}[research/][br/]{ResearchMultiplier} 殖民地[research/]收益

This is a hydro-exploitation. It provides bonuses to both food and energy income. Levels can be increased via economic research. Due to the nature of hydro-exploitation, fewer levels can be gained than from other terrain.
水利开发建筑，可提供食物和能源收益加成。可通过经济研究进行升级。由于水利开发的特性，该建筑可升级的次数少于其他地形。
Hydro-exploitation is a special exploitation which is built in the water.
Upgrades the colony militia army to include more powerful units.
升级殖民地卫队驻防部队，使其包含更强的单位。
The colony militia army is a number of units that defends colonies, and is garrisoned within all of the colonies sectors.
Upgrades the colony militia army to include more powerful units.
升级殖民地卫队驻防部队，使其包含更强的单位。
Upgrades the colony militia army to include more powerful units.
升级殖民地卫队驻防部队，使其包含更强的单位。
The colony gains {Slots} happiness slots and {HappinessFlat} happiness income.
殖民地获得 {Slots} 幸福值槽位和 {HappinessFlat} 幸福值收益。
Happiness is a resource per colony, that shows how happy the population of the colony is with you as their leader.
The colony gains {Slots} happiness slots and {HappinessFlat} happiness income.
殖民地获得 {Slots} 幸福值槽位和 {HappinessFlat} 幸福值收益。
The colony gains {Slots} happiness slots and {HappinessSlotFlat} happiness income per colonist in a happiness slot.
殖民地获得 {Slots} 幸福值槽位，此外位于幸福值槽位中的每名移住民获得 {HappinessSlotFlat} 幸福收益。
The Field Hospital is a defensive military structure that can aid friendly armies within the colony's domain.[br/][br/]Friendly units within this colony's domain regenerate an extra {hp} each turn.
战地医院是一种防御性军事建筑，能够帮助殖民地领域内的友方军队。[br/][br/]该殖民地领域内的友方单位每回合额外恢复 {hp}。
units regenerate hit points (hp) each turn on the world map, this is called regeneration.

A wing in your headquarters dedicated to research into diplomatic interactions with other factions.[br/][br/]{influence} Influence income in your HQ colony.[br/][br/]This is an upgrade to your HQ and can only be built in your HQ colony. When your HQ is moved to another colony, this building is moved as well.
位于总部的外交分析部专门，负责研究与其他阵营的外交活动。[br/][br/]总部殖民地获得 {influence} 影响力收益。[br/][br/]这是总部的一个升级建筑，只能在总部殖民地建造。当总部移至另一个殖民地时，该建筑也会随之移动。

HQ stands for Headquarters, the 'capital' of your empire on this planet. A faction is a force on the world map, each player is a faction, and each computer controled 'side' is a faction.
Influence is a diplomatic currency.

A division in your headquarters developing and monitoring relations with all sentient beings.[br/][br/]{influence} Influence income in your HQ colony.[br/][br/]Requires Diplomatic Analysis Wing.[br/][br/]This is an upgrade to your HQ and can only be built in your HQ colony. When your HQ is moved to another colony, this building is moved as well.
总部中的一个分支部门，负责发展并监控与所有智慧生物之间的关系。[br/][br/]总部殖民地获得 {influence} 影响力收益。[br/][br/]需要外交分析部。[br/][br/]这是总部的一个升级建筑，只能在总部殖民地建造。当总部移至另一个殖民地时，该建筑也会随之移动。

Upgrading the transit infrastructure will reduce travel time within the empire's domain.[br/][br/]Reduces the movement cost of all hexes for friendly units within the colony's domain by {MoveCostReduction}.
升级运输基础设施将缩短帝国领域内的行程时间。[br/][br/]殖民地领域内友方单位的所有单元格移动消耗减少 {MoveCostReduction}。

A hex is a measure of a single space on the world map on which units and structures stand. Each unit has a number of move points, and each hex has a move cost, reducing the move cost of a hex means that units will have to spend less move points to move unto that hex.
A colony's domain is simply the surface area on the world map that is encompassed by all sectors of a colony.

A reseach center where the origins and properties of Cosmite are being researched.[br/][br/]Provides {cosmite} Cosmite income when built in your HQ.[br/][br/]This is an upgrade to your HQ and can only be built in your HQ colony. When your HQ is moved to another colony, this building is moved as well.
研究宇宙合金起源与特性的研究中心。[br/][br/]建于总部时可提供 {cosmite} 宇宙合金收益。[br/][br/]这是总部的一个升级建筑，只能在总部殖民地建造。当总部移至另一个殖民地时，该建筑也会随之移动。

Cosmite is a valuable resource that can be found in the world of Planetfall. It is a special kind of crystal that can be harvested from rifts in reality that lead to the Void, an unknown dark dimension.

Using advanced research, Cosmite can be grown using specialized growth chambers.[br/][br/]Provides {cosmite} Cosmite income when built in your HQ.[br/][br/]This is an upgrade to your HQ and can only be built in your HQ colony. When your HQ is moved to another colony, this building is moved as well.
利用高级研究，可在专用生长室中培养宇宙合金。[br/][br/]建于总部时可提供 {cosmite} 宇宙合金收益。[br/][br/]这是总部的一个升级建筑，只能在总部殖民地建造。当总部移至另一个殖民地时，该建筑也会随之移动。

Harvesting centers allow for increased yields from Cosmite growth chambers.[br/][br/]Provides {cosmite} cosmite income when built in your HQ.[br/][br/]This is an upgrade to your HQ and can only be built in your HQ colony. When your HQ is moved to another colony, this building is moved as well.
收获中心可提高宇宙合金生长室的产量。[br/][br/]建于总部时可提供 {cosmite} 宇宙合金收益。[br/][br/]这是总部的一个升级建筑，只能在总部殖民地建造。当总部移至另一个殖民地时，该建筑也会随之移动。

A specialized reactor that can create Cosmite at an expedited rate, converting energy into Cosmite.[br/][br/]Provides {cosmite} Cosmite income, when built in your HQ. Additionally, your HQ generates {cosmiteConversion} income while generating energy or research.[br/][br/]This is an upgrade to your HQ and can only be built in your HQ colony. When your HQ is moved to another colony, this building is moved as well.
可以将能量转化成宇宙合金的专用反应器，加快宇宙合金的生成速度。[br/][br/]建于总部时可提供 {cosmite} 宇宙合金收益。此外，你的总部在生成能源或研究时可生成 {cosmiteConversion} 收益。[br/][br/]这是总部的一个升级建筑，只能在总部殖民地建造。当总部移至另一个殖民地时，该建筑也会随之移动。
A colony can generate energy or research instead of building a unit or structure. This converts some of the production of the colony into either energy or research.
VR combat sims are a vital tool in preparing forces for battle.[br/][br/]Grants {experience} experience per turn to all units in any stack currently on or adjacent to the colony center hex.
VR 战斗模拟是训练部队战斗的重要工具。[br/][br/]位于殖民地中心单元格内或与其相邻的任意组内的所有单位每回合获得 {experience} 经验。
VR = Virtual Reality. Combat sims = Combat simulations. Each unit can gain experience and increase in rank when they have gained enough experience.
When built, Repeater Defense Turrets help defend the colony in tactical combat.
建造后，连发防御炮塔能够在战术战斗中协助防守殖民地。
Turrets spawn in combat involving the Colony center, and help shoot bad guys.

This institute of protection against hostile operations instils confidence in all under its protection.[br/][br/]Allied units in this colony's domain gain {DvarStructureMoraleBonus}. This colony doesn't suffer from penalties from Volcanic terrain in any of the sectors in its domain.
这座抵御敌方行动的防御建筑能够使人信心倍增。[br/][br/]该殖民地领域内的盟友单位获得 {DvarStructureMoraleBonus}。该殖民地不会遭受其领域内任何区域中火山地形的惩罚。
When built, Bombard Defense Cannons help defend the colony in tactical combat.
建造后，轰击炮能够在战术战斗中协助防守殖民地。

Gathering all broods together allows for more efficient reproduction turnover.[br/][br/]Colony gains {productionassupply} of their food [food/] income (after upkeep) as a production [production/] discount when producing units.
把所有的胚胎聚集在一起，提高繁殖效率。[br/][br/]殖民地在生产单位时减少产力[production/]消耗，减少数值等同于殖民地食物[food/]收益（扣除维持消耗之后）的 {productionassupply}。
As with ant colonies, brood are cocooned larvae of the Kir'ko.
When built, Hiveguard Defense Turrets help defend the colony in tactical combat.
建造后，蜂巢护卫防御炮塔能够在战术战斗中协助防守殖民地。

The IGB is a critical component to the Syndicate society. How else could you successfully engage in politics?[br/][br/]Colony gains True Sight and {OperationDefenceBonus} [operationdefense/] Operational Defense.
情报局 (IGB) 是辛迪加社会的关键组成部分，否则还有什么能够让你的从政之路一帆风顺的呢？[br/][br/]殖民地获得真实视野以及 {OperationDefenceBonus}[operationdefense/]行动防御。

IGB is the abbreviation of the name of the structure. Syndicate is one of the player factions. True sight means the colony can see units that would otherwise be camouflaged within it's domain. Operational Defense is a value each colony has that means enemy hostile operations have a lower chance to succeed, the higher your Operational Defense is.
When built, Suppressor Defense Towers help defend the colony in tactical combat.
建造后，镇压者防御塔能够在战术战斗中协助防守殖民地。
Neural interfacing colonists to imperial datacores found in ruins can provide a boost to research.[br/][br/]Colony gains {knowledge} knowledge income for each Ruins sector within its domain.
连接至帝国数据核心的神经连接移住民可提供研究增益。[br/][br/]殖民地领域内每有一个废墟区域，便获得 {knowledge} 知识收益。
When built, Arc Coil Defense Towers help defend the colony in tactical combat.
建造后，电弧线圈防御塔能够在战术战斗中协助防守殖民地。

Natural observatories make for a great pastime for colonists, with the added advantage of increased border scouting.[br/][br/]Colony gains {moralebonus} happiness for each Forest sector within its domain. In addition, colony vision range is increased by 2 hexes.
天然观测台是移住民很好的消遣去处，同时还有利于边境侦察。[br/][br/]殖民地领域内每有一个森林区域，便获得 {moralebonus} 幸福值收益。此外，殖民地视野范围扩大 2 个单元格。
A sector can be a 'forest sector' if there is a forest located within it.
When built, Laser Defense Turrets help defend the colony in tactical combat.
建造后，激光防御炮塔能够在战术战斗中协助防守殖民地。

A dedicated agricultural export center is vital for the efficient distribution of food to other colonies. At higher levels, increased food yields can be achieved by organized effort towards food production.[br/][br/][productioncol]This can only be built in an agriculture exploitation sector.[/productioncol]
专业的农业出口中心，对向其他移住民高效输送食物而言至关重要。提升至更高等级后，食物生产会变得有条不紊，从而提升食物产量。[br/][br/][productioncol]仅可在农业开发点区域建造。[/productioncol]
Food sharing tax reduced to {FoodSharingModifier}%[supply/] in this colony.
该殖民地内的食物共享税减少至 {FoodSharingModifier}%[supply/]。
When you share food from one colony to the other, you need to pay a tax on this amount, called food tax, which is an amount of food that is wasted in the transsfer.
Food sharing tax reduced to {FoodSharingModifier}%[supply/] in this colony.[br/]+{Supply}[supply/] food when all [foodSlot/] slots are filled.
该殖民地内的食物共享税减少至 {FoodSharingModifier}%[supply/]。[br/]当所有[foodSlot/]槽位填满时，+ {Supply}[supply/]食物。

Advanced bioengineering can create super foods that have a beneficial effect on colonist biology and the growth rate of the colony. At higher levels, your colonists will need less food as upkeep.[br/][br/][productioncol]This can only be built in an agriculture exploitation sector.[/productioncol]
高级生物工程技术可以创造出超级食物，对移住民生理机能和殖民地生长率十分有益。。提升至更高等级后，移住民维持生活所需的食物消耗将会减少。[br/][br/][productioncol]仅可在农业开发点区域建造。[/productioncol]
{ColonistThreshold} food needed to gain a new colonist.
需要 {ColonistThreshold} 食物才能获得新的移住民。
{ColonistThreshold} food needed to gain a new colonist. Colonists have {ColonistUpkeep} food upkeep per turn.
需要 {ColonistThreshold} 食物才能获得新的移住民。移住民每回合拥有 {ColonistUpkeep} 的食物维持消耗。
Colonists cost food to keep happy and not starving, this is their Upkeep cost. This structure lowers that upkeep cost.

By focusing on the wellness of your colonists, their overall health and happiness can be improved and they are quicker to generate happiness events. At higher levels, the rewards from happiness events can be increased.[br/][br/][productioncol]This can only be built in an agriculture exploitation sector.[/productioncol]
关注移住民的身心健康，改善他们的总体健康状况并提升其幸福值，加快幸福事件的生成速度。提升至更高等级后，幸福事件的奖励将增加。[br/][br/][productioncol]仅可在农业开发点区域建造。[/productioncol]
Happiness events can occur when a colony has gained enough positive happiness to reach a threshold value. A happiness event is basically a big party where you get extra resources!
{HappinessThreshold} happiness needed for a happiness event.
需要 {HappinessThreshold} 幸福值才能生成幸福事件。
{HappinessThreshold} happiness needed for a happiness event. Happiness events generate {HappinessEventMultiplier}.
需要 {HappinessThreshold} 幸福值才能生成幸福事件。幸福事件生成 {HappinessEventMultiplier}。

Focusing your industry on military engineering allows for quicker build times for military assets. At higher levels, units are built so well that their defenses are improved.[br/][br/][productioncol]This can only be built in an industrial exploitation sector.[/productioncol][br/][br/][firecol]Unit costs can never be lowered more than 75%.[/firecol]
发展军事工程产业可以缩短军事资产的建造时间。提升至更高等级后，能够打造出防御更高的精良单位。[br/][br/][productioncol]仅可在工业开发点区域建造。[/productioncol][br/][br/][firecol]单位消耗减少不能超过 75%。[/firecol]
{ProductionDiscount} production cost for Core, Skirmisher and Specialist units including mods.
拥有模块的核心、散兵和专家单位的产力消耗减少 {ProductionDiscount}。
Core, Skirmisher and Specialists are unit types. Each unit has a type like this, which corresponds to the role they have in combat.
{ProductionDiscount} production cost for Core, Skirmisher and Specialist units including mods. Skirmisher and Specialist units produced in the colony have {Armor}.
拥有模块的核心、散兵和专家单位的产力消耗减少 {ProductionDiscount}。殖民地生产的散兵和专家单位拥有 {Armor} 护甲。
This unit is a pristine example of its kind. It is so well-built, it has {Armor}.
该单位是此类型单位的全新典范，经过精良打造并拥有 {Armor} 护甲。

Dedicating industrial capacity to civil engineering projects allows for quicker build times. At higher levels, kinetic generators can be built into existing constructions, generating a small passive production bonus.[br/][br/][productioncol]This can only be built in an industrial exploitation sector.[/productioncol]
将工业生产重心集中于土木工程项目来缩短建造时间。提升至更高等级后，可以在现有建筑内建造动力生成器，从而获得少许被动产力加成。[br/][br/][productioncol]仅可在工业开发点区域建造。[/productioncol]
殖民地建筑的产力消耗减少 {ProductionDiscount}。
{ProductionDiscount} production cost for colony structures. The colony gains {ProductionBonus} production for each structure in the colony center.
殖民地建筑的产力消耗减少 {ProductionDiscount}。殖民地中心每有一栋建筑，殖民地便获得 {ProductionBonus} 产量。

Further development in military engineering allows for quicker build times for complex military assets. At higher levels, units are built so well that their defenses are improved.[br/][br/][productioncol]This can only be built in an industrial exploitation sector.[/productioncol]
进一步发展军事工程可以缩短复杂军事资产的建造时间。提升至更高等级后，能够打造出防御更高的精良单位。[br/][br/][productioncol]仅可在工业开发点区域建造。[/productioncol]
{ProductionDiscount} production cost for Elite units including mods.
拥有模块的精英单位的产力消耗减少 {ProductionDiscount}。
Elite is a unit type. Each unit has a type like this, which corresponds to the role they have in combat.
{ProductionDiscount} production cost for Elite units including mods. Elite units produced in the colony have {Armor} armor.
拥有模块的精英单位的产力消耗减少 {ProductionDiscount}。殖民地生产的精英单位拥有 {Armor} 护甲。

By focusing on energy efficiency, the production of units can be made significantly cheaper. At higher levels, this can reduce the upkeep costs of any unit produced in this colony.[br/][br/][productioncol]This can only be built in an energy exploitation sector.[/productioncol][br/][br/][firecol]Unit costs can never be lowered more than 75%.[/firecol][br/][firecol]Unit upkeep can never be lowered more than 50%.[/firecol]
注重节能可以使单位的产力成本显著降低。提升至更高等级后，可以降低该殖民地生产的所有单位的维持消耗。[br/][br/][productioncol]仅可在能源开发点区域建造。[/productioncol][br/][br/][firecol]单位消耗减少不能超过 75%。[/firecol][br/][firecol]单位的维持消耗减少不能超过 50%。[/firecol]
{EnergyCost} energy cost for units including mods.
拥有模块的单位的能源消耗为 {EnergyCost}。
Units cost energy to build, as well as production. Mods are modifications you can apply to your units. You can do this before you build them.
{EnergyCost} energy cost for units including mods. Units produced in this colony have {UnitUpkeep} energy upkeep.
拥有模块的单位的能源消耗为 {EnergyCost}。该殖民地生产的单位拥有 {UnitUpkeep} 的能源维持消耗。
Units have an upkeep value in energy. This is how much energy you need to pay for the unit every turn, else it will desert and leave you =(. Who says money doesn’t buy friends?
This unit's energy upkeep cost is reduced by {reduction}.
该单位的能源维持消耗减少 {reduction}。

Deploying an Arc defense grid provides vision and scanner coverage to your colony borders. At higher levels, the defense grid becomes so strong that it increases the colony's operational defense.[br/][br/][productioncol]This can only be built in an energy exploitation sector.[/productioncol]
部署一道电弧防御网，能够提供殖民地边境的视野和扫面覆盖范围。提升至更高等级后，防御网将变得更加强大，提升殖民地的行动防御。[br/][br/][productioncol]仅可在能源开发点区域建造。[/productioncol]
{Range} to Vision and Sensor range of colony borders.
殖民地边境视野和感应范围增加 {Range}。
{Range} to Vision and Sensor range of colony borders. Colony gains True Sight.
殖民地边境视野和感应范围增加 {Range}。殖民地获得真实视野。
{Range} to Vision and Sensor range of colony borders. Colony gains True Sight and {OpDefense} operational defense within its domain.
殖民地边境视野和感应范围增加 {Range}。殖民地获得真实视野且殖民地领域内获得 {OpDefense} 行动防御。

By controlling colonists and optimizing work processes, efficient gains can be reached during times of focused effort. At higher levels, increased energy production gains can be reached by fully focusing in this direction.[br/][br/][productioncol]This can only be built in an energy exploitation sector.[/productioncol]
管理殖民地并优化工作流程，集中精力，重点突破，从而实现更高的效益。提升至更高等级后，通过抓住重点发展方向，实现能源产力收益的提升。[br/][br/][productioncol]仅可在能源开发点区域建造。[/productioncol]
{CostReduction} energy cost for instantly completing production.
瞬时完成生产的能源消耗减少 {CostReduction}。
You can instantly complete a production project in you colony by spending energy.
{CostReduction} energy cost for instantly completing production. Colony gains {Energy} when all energy slots are filled.
瞬时完成生产的能源消耗减少 {CostReduction}。当所有能源槽位填满时，殖民地获得 {Energy} 能源。

Investing research into society progression will allow quicker access to exploitations of the land, leading to long term economic advantages over other factions, as well as faster access to advanced governmental doctrines and espionage opportunities. At higher levels, colony-wide bonuses can be achieved by focusing all your efforts into research.[br/][br/][productioncol]This can only be built in an research exploitation sector.[/productioncol]
投资社会发展研究可加快土地开发流程，从而比其他阵营获得更长远的经济优势，同时更快接触到高级政府学说和从事间谍活动的机会。提升至更高等级后，通过全力投入研究活动，使整个殖民地获得加成。[br/][br/][productioncol]仅可在研究开发点区域建造。[/productioncol]
{ResearchPercentage} additional research income for Society research in this colony.
该殖民地的社会研究额外获得 {ResearchPercentage} 研究收益。
Society is one of the branches of research, dealing with, economy, governmental policy (doctrines) and covert operations.
{ResearchPercentage} additional research income for Society research in this colony. The colony gains {ResearchIncome} research income when all research slots are filled.
该殖民地的社会研究额外获得 {ResearchPercentage} 研究收益。当所有研究槽位填满时，殖民地获得 {ResearchIncome} 研究收益。

By dedicating research infrastructure to educating troops, their learning capabilities can be enhanced. At higher levels, troops will start with simulated combat experience.[br/][br/]Due to their alien nature, Psi-Fish cannot benefit from this upgrade.[br/][br/][productioncol]This can only be built in an research exploitation sector.[/productioncol]
教育部队专用的研究基础设施，能够提升部队的学习能力。提升至更高等级后，部队将开始进行模拟战斗。[br/][br/]由于灵能水母具有异域性，因此不能从此升级中获益。[br/][br/][productioncol]仅可在研究开发点区域建造。[/productioncol]
the Psi-Fish are one of the NPC factions of the game. They are ethereal floating jellyfish type creatures from the Void.
Units produced in this colony gain experience {ExperienceGain} faster.
该殖民地生产的单位的经验获得速度提升 {ExperienceGain}。
Units produced in this colony gain experience {ExperienceGain} faster. Units produced gain {RankUp} rank.
该殖民地生产的单位的经验获得速度提升 {ExperienceGain}。生产的单位获得 {RankUp} 军阶。
This unit is well trained, earning {experience} more experience from all sources.
该单位训练有素，从所有途径中获得的经验额外增加 {experience}。

Dedicating research to military innovation allows the unlocking of units, unit modifications and operations to increase the defensive capabilities of your forces. At higher levels, colony-wide bonuses can be achieved by focusing all your efforts into research.[br/][br/][productioncol]This can only be built in an research exploitation sector.[/productioncol]
专注于研究军事创新能够解锁单位、单位模块和行动，从而提升部队的防御能力。提升至更高等级后，通过全力投入研究活动，使整个殖民地获得加成。[br/][br/][productioncol]仅可在研究开发点区域建造。[/productioncol]
{ResearchPercentage} additional research income for Military research in this colony.
该殖民地的军事研究额外获得 {ResearchPercentage} 研究收益。
Military is one of the branches of research, dealing with military technology, weapon technology and secret technology.
{ResearchPercentage} additional research income for Military research in this colony. The colony gains {ResearchIncome} research income when all research slots are filled.
该殖民地的军事研究额外获得 {ResearchPercentage} 研究收益。当所有研究槽位填满时，殖民地获得 {ResearchIncome} 研究收益。

By utilizing the biodiverse climate of the ocean for algae farms, more food can be rapidly grown along coast lines. The addition of algae in regular food growth processes can lead to increased yields. At higher levels, food can be exponentially grown with enough dedication.[br/][br/][productioncol]This can only be built in an hydro-exploitation sector.[/productioncol]
海藻农场能够利用海洋的生物多样性气候使沿海地区快速生产更多食物。提升常规食物种植流程中海藻的数量从而提升食物产量。提升至更高等级后，只要在食物生产方面有足够的投入，食物便能实现指数式增长。[br/][br/][productioncol]仅可在水利开发点区域建造。[/productioncol]
+{Food} for each food and hydro exploitation in the colony.
殖民地中每有一个食物和水利开发点，+ {Food}。
+{Food} for each food and hydro exploitation in the colony.[br/]+{FoodPercentage}[supply/] income in the colony.
殖民地中每有一个食物和水利开发点，+ {Food}。[br/]殖民地收益 + {FoodPercentage}[supply/]。

The currents and electrostatic charge of the ocean can be harnessed into energy by building special hydro batteries along the coast. By storing energy during down periods and injecting it into regular energy processes during peak periods, energy gains can be boosted for all exploitations. At higher levels, dedicating the colony to energy production can boost yields even further.[br/][br/][productioncol]This can only be built in an hydro-exploitation sector.[/productioncol]
沿海岸建造特殊的水利电池，利用海水中的洋流和静电电荷生产能量。在低峰期储存能量，并在高峰期将储存的能量输入常规能源生产过程，从而提升所有开发点的能源收益。提升至更高等级后，让殖民地专注于能源生产可进一步提升产能。[br/][br/][productioncol]仅可在水利开发点区域建造。[/productioncol]
+{Energy} for each energy and hydro exploitation in the colony.
殖民地中每有一个能源和水利开发点，+ {Energy}。
+{Energy} for each energy and hydro exploitation in the colony.[br/]+{EnergyPercentage}[energy/] income in the colony.
殖民地中每有一个能源和水利开发点，+ {Energy}。[br/]殖民地 + {EnergyPercentage}[energy/] 收益。

Specialized naval training facilities can decrease production times for naval units and make for faster embarkation. At higher levels, naval units produced gain experience levels.[br/][br/][productioncol]This can only be built in an hydro-exploitation sector.[/productioncol][br/][br/][firecol]Unit costs can never be lowered more than 75%.[/firecol]
专用海军训练设施可以缩短海军单位的生产时间和登船时间。提升至更高等级后，生产的海军单位将获得经验等级。[br/][br/][productioncol]仅可在水利开发点区域建造。[/productioncol][br/][br/][firecol]单位消耗减少不能超过 75%。[/firecol]
Naval units are {ProductionDiscount} cheaper to produce. Embarking within the colony's domain does not cost any additional move points.
海军单位的产力消耗减少 {ProductionDiscount}。在殖民地领域内登船不会消耗任何额外的移动点数。
Embarking is the act of land units going onto a boat in the water, by moving from a land hex to a water hex.
Naval units are {ProductionDiscount} cheaper to produce. Embarking within the colony's domain does not cost any additional move points. Naval units produced in the colony have {RankUp} rank.
海军单位的产力消耗减少 {ProductionDiscount}。在殖民地领域内登船不会消耗任何额外的移动点数。殖民地生产的海军单位拥有 {RankUp} 军阶。

The biodiverse climate of the ocean is provides plenty of research opportunities. Combining the knowledge gained from oceanic research with more conventional research centers boosts gains. At higher levels, knowledge gains increase exponentially with the amount of research that is conducted.[br/][br/][productioncol]This can only be built in an hydro-exploitation sector.[/productioncol]
海洋的生物多样性气候给研究提供了许多机遇。把从海洋研究中获得的知识与传统研究中心成果相结合能够提升收益。提升至更高等级后，知识收益将随进行研究的数量呈现指数式增长。[br/][br/][productioncol]仅可在水利开发点区域建造。[/productioncol]
Knowledge is one of the four main resources, used for research.
+{Research} for each research and hydro exploitation in the colony.
殖民地中每有一个研究和水利开发点，+ {Research}。
+{Research} for each research and hydro exploitation in the colony.[br/]+{ResearchPercentage}[research/] income in the colony.
殖民地中每有一个研究和水利开发点，+ {Research}。[br/]殖民地 + {ResearchPercentage}[research/]收益。
Unlocks the ability to build Skirmisher units in this colony.
解锁在该殖民地建造散兵单位的能力。
Unlocks the ability to build Specialist units in this colony.
解锁在该殖民地建造专家单位的能力。
Unlocks the ability to build Elite units in this colony.
解锁在该殖民地建造精英单位的能力。
[hyperlink,000003AC0000028C]单位角色：精英[/hyperlink][br/][hyperlink,000003CB00000067]精英单位列表[/hyperlink]
An efficient biofarm to provide a boost to a newly settled colony's growth. Provides {Food}[br/][br/][productioncol]Only one Central Structure can be built.[/productioncol]
促进新建殖民地经济增长的高效生态农场。提供 {Food}[br/][br/][productioncol]只能建造一个中央建筑。[/productioncol]
A compact reactor design to provide a boost to a newly settled colony's energy grid. Provides {Energy}[br/][br/][productioncol]Only one Central Structure can be built.[/productioncol]
促进新建殖民地能源网发展的小型反应堆。提供 {Energy}[br/][br/][productioncol]只能建造一栋中央建筑。[/productioncol]
A miniature factory that provides a boost to a newly settled colony's production capabilities. Provides {Production}[br/][br/][productioncol]Only one Central Structure can be built.[/productioncol]
促进新建殖民地生产能力发展的小型工厂。提供 {Production}[br/][br/][productioncol]只能建造一栋中央建筑。[/productioncol]
A basic research facility to provide a boost to a newly settled colony's research effectiveness. Provides {Research}[br/][br/][productioncol]Only one Central Structure can be built.[/productioncol]
促进新建殖民地研究效率提升的基础研究设施。提供 {Research}[br/][br/][productioncol]只能建造一栋中央建筑。[/productioncol]

This is the colony center building. It provides a basic income and room for your colonist to grow.[br/][br/]This structure provides:[br/]{SupplyBaseIncome}[br/]{ProductionBaseIncome}[br/]{HappinessBaseIncome}[br/][br/]{SupplySlots}[br/]{EnergySlots} slots[br/]{ProductionSlots}[br/]{ResearchSlots}

这是殖民地的中心建筑。能够提供基础收益和移住民发展的空间。[br/][br/]该建筑提供：[br/]{SupplyBaseIncome}[br/]{ProductionBaseIncome}[br/]{HappinessBaseIncome}[br/][br/]{SupplySlots}[br/]{EnergySlots} 槽位[br/]{ProductionSlots}[br/]{ResearchSlots}
Each colony has a colony center building, it is the heart of the colony

This is your factions headquarters. When your Commander is defeated in battle, they will recuperate here and respawn here after {RespawnTurns}. Your faction can only have one Headquarters.[br/][br/]This structure provides:[br/][bulletlist][bullet]{EnergyGlobalIncome}[/bullet][br/][bullet]{ResearchGlobalIncome}[/bullet][br/][bullet]{ProductionColonyIncome} [/bullet][br/][bullet]{InfluenceColonyIncome}[/bullet][br/][bullet]{CrystalColonyIncome}[/bullet][/bulletlist]

这是你的阵营总部。当你的指挥官在战斗中被击败时，他们将在此处康复并在 {RespawnTurns}后重生。你的阵营只能拥有一个总部。[br/][br/]该建筑提供：[br/][bulletlist][bullet]{EnergyGlobalIncome}[/bullet][br/][bullet]{ResearchGlobalIncome}[/bullet][br/][bullet]{ProductionColonyIncome} [/bullet][br/][bullet]{InfluenceColonyIncome}[/bullet][br/][bullet]{CrystalColonyIncome}[/bullet][/bulletlist]
Commander is the hero in the game that represents the leader of the player faction, and the player themselves.
生态可持续工业建筑群

By mixing renewable, sustainable resources into construction processes, quicker production times and reduced resource cost can provide a boost to industry.[br/][br/]Your colony gains an additional {production} per [population/] in [productionslot/] for each Forest sector within its domain.
将可再生和可持续资源融入建造过程来缩短生产时间并减少资源消耗，从而促进工业发展。[br/][br/]殖民地领域内每有一个森林区域，位于[productionslot/]中的每名[population/]将获得额外 {production}。

By utilizing the increased windflow at higher altitudes, wind farms built on top of mountains can lead to increased energy gains.[br/][br/]Your colony gains an additional {energy} per [population/] in [energyslot/] for each Mountain sector within its domain.
建于山顶的风力发电厂可以利用高海拔地区的强劲风力获得更多能源收益。[br/][br/]殖民地领域内每有一个山地区域，位于[energyslot/]中的每名[population/]将获得额外 {energy}。

Using the unique properties of fertile plains, special hydro-farms can be built to increase food yield.[br/][br/]Your colony gains an additional {food} per [population/] in [foodslot/] for each Fertile Plains sector within its domain.
特殊的水耕农场能够利用肥沃平原的独特属性来提升食物的产量。[br/][br/]殖民地领域内每有一个肥沃平原区域，位于[foodslot/]中的每名[population/]将获得额外 {food}。

This station is used to analyze old remnants of technology from the Star Union. Some of this ancient tech was lost in time and can boost research.[br/][br/]Your colony gains an additional {research} per [population/] in [researchslot/] for each Ruins sector within its domain.
用于分析星际联盟远古科技残骸的站点。一些湮没在历史长河中的远古科技能够用来强化研究。[br/][br/]殖民地领域内每有一个废墟区域，位于[researchslot/]中的每名[population/]将获得额外 {research}。
Gives +1 level to all food sectors. Raising the sector level of a sector will increase the benefits from sector exploitations and sector specializations in that sector.
所有食物区域的等级 +1。提升区域等级可提升该区域开发点和区域专精获得的收益。
Gives +1 level to all energy sectors. Raising the sector level of a sector will increase the benefits from sector exploitations and sector specializations in that sector.
所有能源区域的等级 +1。提升区域等级可提升该区域开发点和区域专精获得的收益。
Gives +1 level to all production sectors. Raising the sector level of a sector will increase the benefits from sector exploitations and sector specializations in that sector.
所有产力区域的等级 +1。提升区域等级可提升该区域开发点和区域专精获得的收益。
Gives +1 level to all research sectors. Raising the sector level of a sector will increase the benefits from sector exploitations and sector epecializations in that sector.
所有研究区域的等级 +1。提升区域等级可提升该区域开发点和区域专精获得的收益。
Gives +1 level to all production and food sectors in Forests. Raising the sector level of a sector will increase the benefits from sector exploitations and sector specializations in that sector.
位于森林中的所有产力和食物区域等级 +1。提升区域等级可提升该区域开发点和区域专精获得的收益。
Gives +1 level to all research and energy sectors in Ruins. Raising the sector level of a sector will increase the benefits from sector exploitations and sector specializations in that sector.
位于废墟中的所有研究和能源区域等级 +1。提升区域等级可提升该区域开发点和区域专精获得的收益。
Gives +1 level to all research and food sectors in Fertile Plains. Raising the sector level of a sector will increase the benefits from sector exploitations and sector specializations in that sector.
位于肥沃平原中的所有研究和食物区域等级 +1。提升区域等级可提升该区域开发点和区域专精获得的收益。
Gives +1 level to all production and energy sectors in Mountains. Raising the sector level of a sector will increase the benefits from sector exploitations and sector specializations in that sector.
位于山地中的所有产力和能源区域等级 +1。提升区域等级可提升该区域开发点和区域专精获得的收益。

Gives +1 level to all production and energy sectors in Arid climes. Raising the sector level of a sector will increase the benefits from sector exploitations and sector specializations in that sector.
位于干燥气候中的所有产力和能源区域等级 +1。提升区域等级将提升该区域开发点和区域专精中获得的收益。

Gives +1 level to all production and research sectors in Arctic climes. Raising the sector level of a sector will increase the benefits from sector exploitations and sector specializations in that sector.
位于极寒气候中的所有产力和研究区域等级 +1。提升区域等级将提升该区域开发点和区域专精中获得的收益。
Gives +1 level to all energy and food sectors in Arcadian climes. Raising the sector level of a sector will increase the benefits from sector exploitations and sector specializations in that sector.
位于田园气候中的所有能源和食物区域等级 +1。提升区域等级将提升该区域开发点和区域专精中获得的收益。
Gives +1 level to all research and food sectors in Fungal climes. Raising the sector level of a sector will increase the benefits from sector exploitations and sector specializations in that sector.
位于真菌气候中的所有研究和食物区域等级 +1。提升区域等级将提升该区域开发点和区域专精中获得的收益。

Gives +1 level to all sectors in Volcanic climes. Raising the sector level of a sector will increase the benefits from sector exploitations and sector specializations in that sector.[br/][br/]This colony ignores all economic penalties in Volcanic sectors.
位于火山地带的所有区域等级 +1。提升区域等级将提升该区域开发点和区域专精中获得的收益。[br/][br/]该殖民地无视火山区域的所有经济惩罚。
Gives +1 level to all water sectors. Raising the sector level of a sector will increase the benefits from sector exploitations and sector specializations in that sector.
所有水域区域的等级 +1。提升区域等级将提升该区域开发点和区域专精中获得的收益。

A Voidtech Rift Generator that can be used to add special Rift Shields to all units produced in this colony.[br/][br/]All units produced in this colony have {Shields} shields per tier of the unit.[br/][br/]In addition, all Voidtech units produced in this colony deal {damage} damage.
虚空科技裂隙生成器，可为该殖民地生产的所有单位增加特殊的裂隙之盾。[br/][br/]该殖民地生产的所有单位每一阶拥有 {Shields} 护盾。[br/][br/]此外，该殖民地生产的所有虚空科技单位造成 {damage} 伤害。
Rift shields is the name of the property given to units. Voidtech is one of the secret technologies in the game.
Powerful Rift Shields protect this unit, granting it {Shields} extra shields.
强大的裂隙之盾保护着该单位，获得 {Shields} 额外护盾。
This unit is using technology from a Voidtech landmark to increase its damage by {DamageIncrease}.
该单位使用虚空科技地标的技术，伤害提升 {DamageIncrease}。

The Psynumbra Shrine of Darkness can give a permanent fog shroud to units produced in this colony.[br/][br/]All units produced in this colony have {Evasion} evasion.[br/][br/]In addition, all Psynumbra units produced in this colony deal {damage} damage.
黑暗赛努布拉神庙能够让该殖民地生产的单位笼罩在一层永恒的迷雾之中。[br/][br/]该殖民地生产的所有单位拥有 {Evasion} 闪避。[br/][br/]此外，该殖民地生产的所有赛努布拉单位造成 {damage} 伤害。
Psynumbra is one of the secret technologies in the game. With fog shroud we mean the unit is permanently shrouded / covered in a fog that makes them harder to hit. Evasion makes a unit harder to hit.
Dark forces inhabit this unit, granting it {Evasion} evasion against attacks.
黑暗之力栖息在该单位身上，使其获得 {Evasion} 攻击闪避。
This unit is using technology from a Psynumbra landmark to increase its damage by {DamageIncrease}.
该单位使用赛努布拉地标科技，伤害提升 {DamageIncrease}。

The Xenoplague Genetics Lab experiments with genetic selection and alteration, allowing for improved traits in units.[br/][br/]All non-Mechanical units produced in this colony have {health}[hp/] per tier of the unit.[br/][br/]In addition, all Xenoplague-modded units produced in this colony deal {damage} damage.
异星疫病基因实验室对基因选择和基因变异进行实验，能够强化单位特性。[br/][br/]该殖民地生产的所有非机械单位每一阶拥有 {health}[hp/]。[br/][br/]此外，该殖民地生产的所有拥有异星疫病模块单位造成 {damage} 伤害。
Xenoplague is one of the secret technologies in the game.
Genetic modification has increased this unit's vitality, granting it {health} [hp/].
基因改造提升了该单位的活力，赋予其 {health}[hp/]。
This unit is using technology from a Xenoplague landmark to increase its damage by {DamageIncrease}. This property is only active if the unit is modded with a Xenoplague mod.
该单位使用异星疫病地标科技，伤害提升 {DamageIncrease}。只有当单位拥有异星疫病模块时，该属性才会生效。

The Starlight Observatory can give people a glimpse of the Path of Light from the Celestian faith, giving them purpose.[br/][br/]All units produced in this colony have {Morale} morale.[br/][br/]In addition, all Celestian units produced in this colony deal {damage} damage.
星光观测台能够让人们瞥见象征星神信仰的光明之路，赋予他们生命的意义。[br/][br/]该殖民地生产的所有单位拥有 {Morale} 士气。[br/][br/]此外，该殖民地生产的所有星神单位造成 {damage} 伤害。
Celestian is one of the secret technologies in the game. The Path of Light is a philosophy of the Celestian faith. Almost like a religion.
This unit is infused with a Psionic light, granting it {Morale} morale.
该单位被注入了灵能之光，获得 {Morale} 士气。
This unit is using technology from a Celestian landmark to increase its damage by {DamageIncrease}.
该单位使用星神地标科技，伤害提升 {DamageIncrease}。

The Promethean Manufacturing Plant can produce reinforced, heavy duty armor plating that can withstand even the strongest impacts.[br/][br/]All units produced in this colony have {Armor} armor per tier of the unit.[br/][br/]In addition, all Promethean units produced in this colony deal {damage} damage.
圣火制造厂能够生产经过加固的重型装甲，能够承受最强大的冲击。[br/][br/]该殖民地生产的所有单位每一阶拥有 {Armor} 护甲。[br/][br/]此外，该殖民地生产的所有圣火单位可造成 {damage} 伤害。

Units have tiers, which tells the player how strong the unit is (roughly). Tier 1 units are starting units, where tier 4 units are super strong units only available after heavy research and production investments.
This unit is reinforced with armor plating, granting it {Armor} extra armor.
该单位装备了强化护甲，获得 {Armor} 额外护甲。
This unit is using technology from a Promethean landmark to increase its damage by {DamageIncrease}.
该单位使用圣火地标科技，伤害提升 {DamageIncrease}。

The Synthesis Weapons Facility modifies all weapons produced in the colony by adding smart weapon linking to it, increasing their effectiveness.[br/][br/]All units produced in this colony have {Accuracy} accuracy.[br/][br/]In addition, all Synthesis units produced in this colony deal {damage} damage.
合成武器设施能够将殖民地与智能武器相连来改造殖民地生产的所有武器，从而提升效率。[br/][br/]该殖民地生产的所有单位拥有 {Accuracy} 准度。[br/][br/]此外，该殖民地生产的所有合成单位造成 {damage} 伤害。
Synthesis is one of the secret technologies in the game. With weapon linking we mean they are connected to a network that gives them better targeting.
This unit's weapons are linked to smart tracking systems, granting it {Accuracy} accuracy.
该单位的武器与智能追踪系统相连，获得 {Accuracy} 准度。
This unit is using technology from a Synthesis landmark to increase its damage by {DamageIncrease}.
该单位使用合成地标科技，伤害提升 {DamageIncrease}。
Old Imperial training regimes help train local forces. Units produced in this colony start with increased combat experience.[br/][br/]All units produced in this colony have {Medals} ranks.
古老的帝国训练制度能够帮助训练当地部队。该殖民地生产的单位的初始战斗经验增加。[br/][br/]该殖民地生产的所有单位拥有 {Medals} 军阶。

The Cryo-Medical Facility can infuse units produced in this colony with a special cryogenic mixture that gives them increased fortitude.[br/][br/]Biological and Cyborg units produced in this colony have {Resistance} resistance to status effects.
冷冻医疗设施可以向该殖民地生产的单位注入特殊的冷冻混合物，给予他们坚韧的毅力。[br/][br/]该殖民地生产的生物和半机械人单位对状态效果拥有 {Resistance} 抵抗。
Using special cryogenic processes, this unit's resistances have been bolstered, granting it {Resistance} resistance against all status effects and giving it one level of stagger resistance.
该单位利用特殊的冷冻程序使自身抗性得到了强化，对所有状态效果获得 {Resistance} 抵抗并获得 1 级动摇抵抗。

Due to certain Relaxation Centers being available during training, Infantry produced in this colony are more mentally rested and tend to pick up new skills at an expedited rate.[br/][br/]All units produced in this colony gain {Experience} experience from all sources.
该殖民地生产的步兵单位在训练期间可前往休闲中心放松身心，从而更容易掌握新的技巧。[br/][br/]该殖民地生产的所有单位从所有途径获得 {Experience} 经验。
This unit had a very invigorating training period, granting it {XPBoost} increased experience from all sources.
该单位进行的训练使其精力充沛，从所有途径获得的经验增加 {XPBoost}。

The Starship Maintenance Bay uses special alloys suitable for the harsh environment of space in the construction of units, making units produced in this colony more durable.[br/][br/]Mechanical units produced in this colony have {Resistance} resistance to all damage.
星际飞船维护港利用能够适应太空严峻环境的特殊合金来建造单位，使该殖民地建造的单位耐久性更高。[br/][br/]该殖民地生产的机械单位对所有伤害拥有 {Resistance} 抵抗。
This unit was built using special alloys suitable for the harsh environment of space, granting it {Resistance} resistance to all damage.
该单位由能够适应太空严峻环境的特殊合金打造而成，对所有伤害获得 {Resistance} 抵抗。

By using technology salavaged from the nearby Derelict Energy Reactor in a special Shielding Laboratory, the survivability of units can be improved via special shielding.[br/][br/]All units produced in this colony gain {shields} shield.
从附近的废弃能量反应堆中提取科技并用于护盾实验室的研究，借助特殊护盾提升单位的存活能力。[br/][br/]该殖民地生产的所有单位获得 {shields} 护盾。
This unit has experimental protective shielding, granting it {shields} shield.
该单位拥有实验性防御护盾，获得 {shields} 护盾。

By studying old Imperial Archives found in the collapsed research center, units can gain unique insight in war tactics.[br/][br/]All non-Mindless units produced in this colony gain {experience} experience from all sources.
通过学习从倒塌的研究中心发现的古老帝国档案，单位能够获得关于战争策略的独到见解。[br/][br/]该殖民地生产的所有无意识单位从所有途径获得 {experience} 经验。
This unit has insight into old Imperial war tactics, granting it {experience} experience from all sources.
该单位对古老的帝国战术有着独到见解，从所有途径获得 {experience} 经验。

Special Nutrition Centers that use genetically superior food from the Overgrown Biodome Farm can give units a boost during their training by increasing their fortitude.[br/][br/]All non-Mechanical units produced in this colony gain {health} maximum [hp/].
特殊营养中心利用产自巨型生物穹顶农场的优质基因食物，增强单位韧性，促进训练表现。[br/][br/]该殖民地生产的所有非机械单位获得 {health} 最大[hp/]。
Due to being provided with genetically superior food during their training, this unit has increased fortitude, granting it {health} maximum [hp/].
该单位在训练时食用了优质基因食物，毅力得到了提升，获得 {health} 最大[hp/]。

Using the technologies derived from the Imperial Mining Facility, armor reinforcement processes can be applied to units to increase their durability.[br/][br/]All units produced in this colony gain {armor} armor.
利用源自帝国矿采设施的科技向单位运用护甲强化流程，提升耐久性。[br/][br/]该殖民地生产的所有单位获得 {armor} 护甲。
This unit has reinforced armor plating, granting it {armor} armor.
该单位具有强化护甲，拥有 {armor} 护甲。

The harsh conditions in aquatic training facilities can aid in the training of troops, creating tougher, more resilient forces.[br/][br/]All units produced in this colony gain {resistance} resistance to status effects.
水上训练设施的恶劣条件可以更好地锻炼部队，从而打造出更加强悍坚韧的部队。[br/][br/]该殖民地生产的所有单位对状态效果获得 {resistance} 抵抗。
This unit has hardened constitution, giving it {resistanceBoost} resistance to status effects.
该单位拥有坚硬的体格，对状态效果拥有 {resistanceBoost} 抵抗。

In the text below, text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.

In the text below, any inserted strings - anything of the form {text} - is replaced by an integer value for the thing described in the brackets. If the {text} is not followed by a unit - e.g. shields, hitpoints - the icon for the unit is inserted together with the integer. The same holds for symbols - e.g. '+', '%' - which are occasionally inserted together with the integer.
For references to game terminology and in-world references, please check the glossary delivered as part of the documentation.
